name: casdoor
description: Casdoor is an identity provider and SSO platform that integrates OAuth, SAML, OIDC, LDAP, and JWT. It provides customizable login templates and dashboards, and integrates easily with backend apps.
features: Identity Provider: Comprehensive SSO and authentication platform. Unified access.
Multiple Protocols: OAuth, SAML, OIDC, LDAP, and JWT support. Universal compatibility.
Customizable UI: Branded login pages and templates. Professional appearance.
User Management: Complete user lifecycle and profile management. Centralized control.
Social Login: Integration with Google, GitHub, and more. Easy authentication.
Backend Integration: Easy integration with any application. Developer-friendly.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over identity infrastructure. Data sovereignty.
